title: Foundation: Strong Maths and Programming Basics
description: A G.C.E. A/L in the Maths stream is highly recommended due to the heavy use of physics and complex algorithms in game development. Start learning a foundational programming language like C++ or C# on your own.

title: Learn a Game Engine & Higher Education
description: Master a popular game engine like Unity (C#) or Unreal Engine (C++/Blueprints). A degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering provides the necessary theoretical background in algorithms, data structures, and software architecture.

title: Junior Game Developer & Portfolio
description: Join a game development studio as a junior developer. Your main task is to build a strong portfolio by creating small games or prototypes. Participate in game jams (like the Sri Lankan Game Jam) to gain experience and network.
qualifications: A portfolio with several completed small games
institutes: Other independent game studios in Sri Lanka

title: Game Developer
description: As a Game Developer, you'll take on more complex systems, such as AI, networking for multiplayer, or complex gameplay mechanics. You can start specializing in a specific area like graphics programming, AI programming, or tools programming.
qualifications: Shipped at least one commercial title
institutes: Leading game studios in Sri Lanka and abroad (remote)

title: Senior/Lead Game Developer or Indie Developer
description: Advance to a lead role, guiding the technical vision of a project and mentoring other programmers. Alternatively, use your experience to start your own independent (Indie) game studio to create and publish your own games.
